title: Scorched Earth Renekton Sound Bug

embed.description: Playing League of Legends in Summoner's Rift as Scorched Earth Renekton. Spells: Teleport + Flash Masteries: Physics can't touch dis Runes: Vampirism My standard rune and mastery pages of this season: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-EoJ8G4nwWJg3WuGZM11mn0gewI8kyhNNzj9bRwJBqA/edit?usp=sharing My Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/LeagueHeadinPants My Twitter: https://twitter.com/HeadinPants My Stream (I'm trying to stream 6pm Sundays Central USA time): http://www.twitch.tv/headinpants Join the League!

body:
When Renekton's skill hit , A sound that only works as Scorched Earth Renekton must work.
But that sound has not worked since  Renekton got a bit rework.
Is this bug? 
Its a big problem for me..

replies.body:
Im sorry. 
I forgot about this post.
Please compare this movies.
Now sound https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_BTath34i-A
Old sound https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MBhVipF2Nh0

Hey S4va,

I'm not sure I understand your bug report.

Which sound are you referring to? You'd mentioned it was a skill - which skill were you using?
